maze.logic

Class Hero

  • java.lang.Object
    • maze.logic.Element
      • maze.logic.Moveable
        • maze.logic.Hero
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Hero
extends Moveable
    Class that represents all "hero" type objects. An hero has the following atributes: - won: if the hero has the sword and killed all dragons, it is in a "won" position and is able to exit the maze and wind the game. - hasEagle: determines whether the eagle follows the hero or not.
    See Also:
    Moveable, Serialized Form
